title: CapsNetwork – International Network for Capsule Imaging in Endoscopy
problem: Digestive system diseases like inflammatory bowel disease and cancer affect a large population. Early diagnosis is crucial but challenging.
approach: Enhance endoscopy images using capsule imaging to aid in the early diagnosis of digestive diseases.
outcomes: International Partner Project between India, Norway, USA, Germany, and China

title: Study And Implementation Of Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) For Image Super-Resolution: Application To Images Captured Using CCTV Camera
problem: CCTV cameras acquire low-resolution images due to distance, making it difficult to detect and solve threat activities.
approach: Using GANs to reconstruct high-frequency details and remove acquisition degradations in LR images.
outcomes: 3 reputed journal papers (SCI) including IEEE Transactions
14th rank in NTIRE-2020 'Real-world image Super-resolution' competition (USISResNet model)
collaborators: Department of Science and Technology (DST), India

funding.agency: Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB), Department of Science and Technology (DST), India
